        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r

        },\r

    itemContainer: cva([\r
        "UI-RadioGroup__itemContainer",\r
        "flex gap-2 items-center relative",\r
    ]),\r
    itemCheckIcon: cva([\r
        "UI-RadioGroup__itemCheckIcon",\r
        "text-white",\r
    ], {\r

            },\r
        },\r
